Amendment.text: 000: After Clause 29, insert the following new Clause— “Publication of guidelines for third parties regarding regulation of expenditure (1) As soon as is reasonably practicable after the passing of this Act the Electoral Commission shall publish guidelines to assist third parties to determine what procedures are necessary for them to ensure compliance with the provisions of this Act. (2) The provisions of this Act regulating expenditure by third parties shall not come into effect until three months have elapsed after the publication of the guidelines mentioned in subsection (1). (3) In the event that the effect of subsections (1) and (2) is that the period remaining prior to the 2015 general election is less than the relevant period, the limits on expenditure by third parties will be reduced to the relevant proportion of the maximum permitted expenditure. (4) In subsection (3) the “relevant proportion” means the proportion of the maximum permitted expenditure represented byABwhere— A is the number of days remaining after the expiry of the three month period specified in subsection (2) until the date of the poll for the 2015 general election and B is 365.”
